name: Puzz Loop (itch)
description:
Aim your cannon with the [A] and [D] keys and shoot with the [W] key. When a ball hits a train, it will insert itself into the train. If a sequence of three or more balls of the same color are formed, they will pop, which splits the train in two. Points are awarded for inserting a ball, and for popping them.

Design by Mark Neal.
Game-U Instructor: Jason Conaway
